function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Cash flow issues and financial instability","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Government not effectively communicating risk","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of coordination between engineering disciplines","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of capital outflows and economic damage to low-income countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of training and network-related capital in inter-agency and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 through the air at a distance of 2m or more in a confined and crowded environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data analysis on compliance measures","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Societal issues and the human factor","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Scarcity of data sharing during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient number of testing kits leading to infeasibility of large-scale covid-19 testing.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced access to ugs during covid-19 restrictions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in tourism revenue","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Digital divide and information gap","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conflict between reducing airborne infection risk and risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate research conducted to imagine how the antivirus-built environment would look","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of
